name: Xalor Smite
description:
Boss fight shooter with a unique twist. Includes:

- An intimidating boss with over six unique attacks! (he has seven attacks)

- Atari-like auditory aesthetic

- Tons of replayability if you're creative enough

- An entire hotdog!

Created for Weekly Game Jam - Week 105 - "Cheat to Win"

STOP READING IF YOU WANT TO FIGURE OUT THE PUZZLE YOURSELF! THIS PART IS ONLY FOR PEOPLE WHO GOT FRUSTRATED OR CONFUSED!

==============================================================

To beat Xalor's Smite, you must edit your save files.

Step 1 - Save your game

Step 2 - Open up file explorer

Step 3 - Go to Local Disk (C)

Step 4 - Go to Users

Step 5 - Go to Owners

Step 6 - What you need to go to next isn't already visible. You must go to the search bar and type "AppData/local"

Step 7 - Scroll down to "Xalor's Smite"

I'm sure you can figure out the rest from there. Please alert me if these steps don't work for you.
